permafrost.tundra.io

Class DeleteOnCloseFileInputStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.InputStream
      • java.io.FileInputStream
        • permafrost.tundra.io.MarkableFileInputStream
          • permafrost.tundra.io.DeleteOnCloseFileInputStream
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable

    public class DeleteOnCloseFileInputStream
extends MarkableFileInputStream
    Automatically deletes the underlying file when the close method is called on the input stream.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class permafrost.tundra.io.MarkableFileInputStream

        isClosed, markPosition

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DeleteOnCloseFileInputStream(java.io.File file)
      Constructs a new AutoDeleteFileInputStream by opening a connection to an actual file, the file named by the File object file in the file system.
      DeleteOnCloseFileInputStream(java.lang.String name)
      Constructs a new AutoDeleteFileInputStream by opening a connection to an actual file, the file named by the path name in the file system.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Closes this file input stream and releases any system resources associated with the stream, then deletes the file.
      java.io.File getFile()
      Returns the file this input stream reads from.
